level1_basic_discovery: Do you already have a business idea?
Do you already have a business name?
Do you already have a tagline?
Do you have a one-line description?
Do you already know your target audience?
Do you know the main problem your business solves?
Do you know the solution or product you will provide?
Do you know any competitors or similar products?
Do you know the brand vibe or style you want?
Do you know your short-term and long-term goals?
level2_foundation_scan: Who is your market? (B2B, B2C, niche, mass, local, global)
How will your business make money? (Revenue model)
What unique value does your business offer?
What are the main features or benefits you plan to offer?
Why is now the right time for this business?
Who are your main customer segments?
What are your biggest strengths as a founder?
What challenges or weaknesses do you have as a founder?
Why do you want to build this business?
What is your estimated starting budget?
How strong is your competition? (low / medium / high)
What are the biggest risks to your business?
What limitations do you have? (Time / skill / money)

idea_dimension: Has the problem been validated? If yes, how?
How big can this opportunity become?
What type of innovation is this? (Incremental / Disruptive)
customer_dimension: Who are your ideal customers demographically?
What psychographics describe your customers? (Values, mindset, lifestyle)
How strong is the market demand for this idea?
product_dimension: How does your solution relieve pains?
How does your solution create gains?
What makes this business hard to replace?
business_dimension: What pricing strategy will you use?
What revenue streams will your business have?
What key metrics will you track?
What is your market entry strategy?
branding_dimension: What brand tone do you prefer?
Which brand archetype fits your business?
What color psychology matches your brand?
What logo concept do you imagine?
What themes define your brand story?
founder_dimension: What is your mission as a founder?

digital_needs_scan: Do you need a mobile app?
Do you need an AI assistant?
Do you need a dashboard or admin panel?
Do you need a marketing funnel?
Do you need an e-commerce system?
Do you need analytics and tracking tools?
Do you need internal tools or ERP?
Do you need a community platform?
